title: Graduate School to Host Diversity Scholars Visitation Program (University of Arkansas)
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) The Graduate School and International Education is hosting a Diversity Scholars Visitation program Nov. 8-10. The program aims to increase the diversity of the graduate student body by providing prospective
